artist: Engraver: Cornelis Bloemaert; Delineator: After Cyrus Ferrius; Artist: After Francisco Romanelli
description: allegorical scene; three women exiting a doorway with Medici Family arms above; first woman holding geometric tools and unwinding string held by second woman; second woman has algebraic symbols on hem of robe; third woman holding open globe shaped object
